venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Over night river tubing adventure on the Farmington River in Connecticut on Saturday with a visit to the Bridge of Flowers in Shelburne Falls MA on Sunday.

Click here: Farmington River Tubing

Farmington River Tubing will put you and your friends in our specially designed river tubes for a 2.5 mile ride down the wild and scenic Farmington River.

Traveling over three sets of rapids, you'll experience a thrill as you splash through the white water.

The Bridge of Flowers, located in Shelburne Falls, MA  is a 400 foot long former trolley line bridge that has been converted into a garden pathway.

 

Book rooms at the Springhill Suites:

Click here: Springhill Suites by Marriott Hartford Airport /Windsor Locks

Contact June if you need to find room mates and she will organize getting you all together.

 

MEETING LOCATION:  Randolph Dunkin Donuts

Meeting time:  8 am

                      ride leaves at 830 am

 

Please remember besides a bathing suit or something suitable for the river, you should wear water shoes, old sneakers or sandals that will not come off your feet.  Don't wear your favorite sunglasses or hat so you don't loose them on the river!   

If you tend to get cold they suggest a nylon windbreaker instead of a cotton T shirt....it dries quicker. 

There is a threat of a possible thunder storms on Sunday due to the humidity so if you have to choose between your towel and rain suit........talk to Fran!!!!!!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Rumble on the River
